module.title: anthroponyms
module.p: Anthroponyms are names identifying people and other personified entities like toys, boats, pet animals, &c.
Like other kinds of name, anthroponyms can be classified into two distinct grammatical types –

ul.li: anthroponymic proper nouns eg. Mairead Margaret, Seumas Beag Little James
anthroponymic name-descriptions eg. An Caiptean The Captain, Bean Alasdair Alexander’s Wife
